description.en: Indoor-outdoor pool house and alfresco entertaining area in Brighton. Non-slip textured porcelain pavers around the pool, mosaic feature wall in the changing room, full waterproofing, and weather-resistant caulking at all expansion joints.
description.zh: Brighton泳池房及户外休闲区。泳池周边防滑纹理瓷质砖、更衣室马赛克特色墙面、全面防水处理，以及所有伸缩缝耐候密封。
